00024 #include <vle/extension/DifferenceEquation.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace Layer {
00027 
00028     class LayerPhenology: public vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple
00029     {
00030     public:
00031         LayerPhenology(const vle::devs::DynamicsInit& init,
00032               const vle::devs::InitEventList& events) :
00033         vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple(init, events)
00034         {
00035         // Variables d'etat gerees par ce composant LayerPhenology
00036         LayerTTApp = createVar("LayerTTApp");
00037         LayerTTSen = createVar("LayerTTSen");
00038         LayerTTExp = createVar("LayerTTExp");
00039         LayerAge = createVar("LayerAge");
00040         LayerNb = createVar("LayerNb");
00041 
00042         // Variables  gérées par un autre  composant ici "meteo"
00043         TempEff = createSync("TempEff"); 
00044 
00045         // Lecture des parametres
00046         P_Phyllochron = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_Phyllochron"));
00047         P_LayerExp = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_LayerExp"));
00048         P_LayerSen = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("P_LayerSen"));
00049         }
00050 
00051 
00052         virtual ~LayerPhenology() {};
00053 
00054 
00055             virtual void compute(const vle::devs::Time& /*time*/)
00056         {
00057         //std::cout << "LayerPhenology compute begin" << std::endl;
00058         // Date d'apparition des strates
00059         for ( int i=1; i<50; i++){
00060             LayerTTApp[i] = i * P_Phyllochron;
00061         }
00062         
00063         // Date de demi-expansion des strates
00064         for ( int i=1; i<50; i++){
00065             LayerTTExp[i] = LayerTTApp[i] + P_LayerExp;
00066         }
00067         
00068         // Date de demi-senescence des strates
00069         for ( int i=1; i<50; i++){
00070             LayerTTSen[i] = LayerTTExp[i] + P_LayerSen;
00071         }
00072         }
00073 
00074             virtual void initValue(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00075             {
00076         //std::cout << "LayerPhenology init begin" << std::endl;
00077         LayerTTApp = 0.0;
00078         LayerTTExp = 0.0;
00079         LayerTTSen = 0.0;
00080         }
00081 
00082 
00083         private:
00084         //Variables d'etat
00085         Var LayerTTApp; 
00086         Var LayerTTExp; 
00087         Var LayerTTSen; 
00089         //Entrées
00090         Sync TempEff;
00091 
00092         //Parametres du modele
00093         double P_Phyllochron; 
00094         double P_LayerExp; 
00095         double P_LayerSen; 
00096     };
00097 }
00098 DECLARE_NAMED_DYNAMICS(LayerPhenology, Layer::LayerPhenology); // balise specifique VLE
